issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw: I got it to work with a remote computer by setting up a VPN and then using the VPN IP addresses for ROS_IP and  ROS_MASTER_URI. World frame is getting through OK with that setup.  The next question, perhaps it is another issue, is what form, if at all, will world frame be available for the competition.
content.html: I got it to work with a remote computer by setting up a VPN and then using the VPN IP addresses for ROS_IP and ROS_MASTER_URI. World frame is getting through OK with that setup. The next question, perhaps it is another issue, is what form, if at all, will world frame be available for the competition.
